body.ab:
bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum gyis sbyar ba las | de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang | rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang | phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams kyis blos
bslang dka' bar gyur pa dang | bdag nyid chen po de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang | gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhi‹g›zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor | 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la | brjod kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin
pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni | bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras kyi bka' drin la brten nas | lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing | 'chad pa dang | rtsod pa dang | rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pas | dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen por This is assumed to be the same as brag ram mgon khang (id: 4369)
nye bar sbyar ba 'di | re shig rdzogs s+ho ||
